entry.title: Tuesday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with a few rain showers or wet flurries. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers or wet flurries changing to a few flurries and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
